desc: Rudy's shop in the heart of downtown Fort Wayne, Indiana. Known for their amazing selection of premium cigars, craft beer, and Indiana wines. A fully stocked humidor that specializes in Tatuaje, RoMa Craft, Arturo Fuente, My Father cigars and more!

layout.text:
Fort Wayne's best bar for cigars, Indiana craft beer, and wine!
Located right downtown next to Parkview Field. Gorgeous beer garden with tons of seating
OPEN MON - THURS NOON TO 10 PM
FRI & SAT NOON TO MIDNIGHT
SUNDAYS 12 TO 6
WEBSTORE OPEN 24/7
